title: President Alvi visits UAE embassy, condoles the death of UAE president
content:
ISLAMABAD, MAy 16 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi on Monday visited the embassy of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and offered heartfelt condolences to the royal family, the people and the Government of UAE on the death of President Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan.
